subject: New York City Marathon
Marathon Running
lead_paragraph: Paul Tergat's marathon win in New York last year was the closest finish in race history. In the final strides through Central Park, Tergat edged Hendrick Ramaala of South Africa to win by a second after 26.2 miles.
snippet: Paul Tergat's marathon win in New York last year was the closest finish in race history. In the final strides through Central Park, Tergat edged Hendrick Ramaala of South Africa to win by a second after 26.2 miles.
